text: @NYGovCuomo Spare us your incessant virtue signaling, Cuomo.  "The virus does not respond to politics or party", but some mass gathering are okay and others are not?  You have handled the COVID-19 problem worse than all of the other governors, yet you presume to lecture them and us.
